Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.12429503]Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=2 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=13 µM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Esculentin-1ARa has antibacterial against the Gram-positive bacterium S. aureus and the Gram-negative bacterium E. coli. Also exhibits hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes (HC50=180 µM).

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides and protease inhibitors in the skin secretions of the crawfish frog, Rana areolata.
Literature.Author: Ali MF, Lips KR, Knoop FC, Fritzsch B, Miller C, Conlon JM.
